data.author: Afonso Santos

changelog.release_notes: Time-2 support added

1) Safeguards against a vibrating environment (motorcycle, bicycle) spinning up the clock to crazy spin speeds: shake motions (the spin-up gesture) closer than 3 seconds apart will now be ignored.

2) Spin speed max limit also introduced to prevent spin speeds that would take too long to bleed-out (wasting too much battery).

3) Flip digit animation length reduced to 25 frames (1 sec) also to save on battery.

Font change discarded.
Every vigorous shake will now just increase the spinning speed.

Flipping animation reduced from 50 frames (2s) to 35 frames (1.5sec)
Should also contribute to even less bat use.
Per user request/feed-back, (with the goal of saving some BAT) the z-Axis cube spinning motion will only be launched on user TWIST gesture.
OS v4.0
Added a bit of launch inertia to avoid jerkiness in initial movement
DYNAMIC -> STEADY transition smoothed (eliminated final jerk/snap into "DDMMHH" position)

Awkward STEADY mode's viewPoint bug fixed.
After DYNAMIC mode animations now cube "parks" in an orientation that guarantees visibility of DD/HH/MM faces

Dual color digits
Total of 8 fonts available.
Use PUNCH gesture to change font in use.
alternate thick tick marks on the radial dials

New default font for digits.

Use PUNCH gesture to change font in use (5 different fonts available)

1 more digit font type added (3 in total now)
Use PUNCH gesture to change digit font in use.
Added 1/100th of seconds face (oposite to minutes face)

Glyphs for digits 2 & 5 refined.
Bug fixed: after a PUNCH triggered flip (DYNAMIC mode) some faces were missing values.

Antialised (smoother) lines + less blocky digit fonts
Animation frame rate reduced to 25fps.
Fixed geometric bug where digits were "bending" near the borders of the screen when flipping.

Single digit hours/days centered
Single digit hours with circular radial dial
New top of the hour/day radial dial extrusion animations
Analog radial dials gained a coloured outer ring.
New launch animation

data.description:
Gravity & gesture aware interactive 3D flipping clock.

STEADY mode:
- TWIST : DYNAMIC mode

DYNAMIC mode:
- TWIST  : spin up

Will fallback to STEADY mode after 5s not spinning.
data.title: FlipClock 3D
